name: I am your familiar for now
name_original: I am your familiar for now
description:
I am your familiar for now.

Print out and cut out your new familiar. Give them a name and an aspirational destination. Now they're your problem.

Keep your familiar safe and with you at all times until you can deliver them to their destination. Until then, they can keep you company and be a welcomed companion on your quest.

"When you finally bring me to my destination, take a photo to remember the partnership we had. I will miss you."

Entrant  to Pleasure Card RPG Jam
